name: Ethereum
info: The Ethereum module will generate an Ethereum wallet identity which is useful in interacting with the Ethereum blockchain.

name: Blockstack
info: The Blockstack module will generate a Blockstack identity and register that identity on Blockstack's peer-to-peer network.

name: Textile
info: The Textile module creates a Textile wallet which is useful both for identity and for creating 'threads' on Textile.
